title: "On Pins and Needles" - The Immortal Pin Game
description:
#agadmator Geoff Chandler vs Richard Kynoch
"On Pins and Needles" (game of the day Jul-12-2014)
Edinburgh Club Championship (1981), Edinburgh SCO 
Caro-Kann Defense: Advance Variation. Van der Wiel Attack (B12)

1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. e5 Bf5 4. Nc3 e6 5. g4 Bg6 6. Nge2 c5 7. Be3 Nc6 8. dc5 Ne5 9. Nd4 Rc8 10. Bb5 Nc6 11. Qe2 Nf6 12. O-O-O Be7 13. h4 h5 14. f3 Nd7 15. gh5 Rh5 16. Rhg1 Nd4 17. Bd4 Qc7 18. Rg6 fg6 19. Qe6 Rf5 20. Nd5 Qd8 21. Qg6 Rf7 22. Re1 Kf8 23. Qh7 Ke8 24. Qg8 Rf8 25. Qg7 Rf7 26. Qg8 Rf8 27. Nf6#
